name: Gameplay Feature request
about: Suggest an idea for this project
title: "[FEATURE]"
labels: enhancement, gameplay
assignees: ''

---

## **What gameplay problem or gap does this address?**
*Describe what’s missing or what feels off during gameplay.
Example: “Combat feels too repetitive in early levels” or “Players have no reason to explore side areas.”*

## **What’s your proposed gameplay feature or change?**
*Explain what you’d like added or changed to improve the player experience.
Example: “Introduce unique enemy abilities per region” or “Add exploration bonuses for discovering landmarks.”*

## **How would this affect gameplay or player choice?**
*Describe how this feature changes the way players interact with the game, other systems, or each other.
Example: “Encourages risk-taking and exploration” or “Adds more tactical depth to combat.”*

## **Have you considered any alternatives?**
*List any other approaches or variations you’ve thought about and why you prefer this one.*

## ***Additional details or references***
*Include any sketches, references, or inspiration that help explain your idea.*
